SEARCH
Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface RmiServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MatchServer
public interface RmiServerInterface extends Remote
This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the MatchServer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isAlive()
    This method is used to ping the server or the client
    void
    makeMove(List<Position> pos, int col, String nickname)
    This method is used to join a game
    void
    messageAll(String message, String speaker)
    This method is used to send a chat message to all the players in the game
    void
    messageSomeone(String message, String speaker, String receiver)
    This method is used to send a chat message

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      void makeMove(List<Position> pos, int col, String nickname) throws RemoteException, InvalidNicknameException, InvalidMoveException, GameEndedException
      This method is used to join a game
      Parameters:
      pos - the position chosen by the player
      col - the column chosen by the player
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      InvalidNicknameException - if the nickname is invalid
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is invalid
      GameEndedException - if the game is ended

    • messageSomeone

      void messageSomeone(String message, String speaker, String receiver) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to send a chat message
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent
      speaker - the nickname of the player who sent the message
      receiver - the nickname of the player who will receive the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost

    • messageAll

      void messageAll(String message, String speaker) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to send a chat message to all the players in the game
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent
      speaker - the nickname of the player who sent the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to ping the server or the client
      Returns:
      true if the server/client is alive, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
